hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
export VMNAME="tester.gc-system.cz" /puppet/jenkins/bin/xen.init login /puppet/jenkins/bin/xen.init build /puppet/jenkins/bin/xen.init start /puppet/jenkins/bin/xen.init fixup /puppet/jenkins/bin/xen.init ssh_delegate 'sh -x bootstrap.install.sh' ############
/puppet/jenkins/bin/xen.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh phase2.install.sh' /puppet/jenkins/bin/xen.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh metalib/tests/phase2.sh'
